kviz.explanation: This is a metonymy because we __relate__ a department in a company to what this department does
This is a metaphor because we __compare__ person to something ugly and unpleasant

kviz.example: Bas Scheveningen is the principal __viola__ in the Concertgebouworkest
kviz.explanation: This is a metonymy because we __relate__ an instrumentalist to the instrument he plays
This is a metaphor because we __compare__ readability or maintainability of code with beauty
This is a metaphor because we __compare__ what one does with something
